page.title: 12CHANGING TIMES
page.content: Yate has become much bigger in the last twenty years.A village has grown into a new town.There is more traffic on the main roads and the shops are busy on Thursday and Friday evenings and on Saturdays.Apart from a few trees the area was very bare.Now the gardens are full of trees,shrubs and flowers and the pathways are surrounded by grass. At one time Yate was full of young married couples and young families,now there are more older people here. The facilities are better now. There is a sports centre,parks,new schools and a big shopping centre. New houses are continually being built and the industrial estates are getting larger.
